text: Wiesław Glos (12 September 1936 – 6 January 2021) was a Polish fencer. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Kraków, Poland. Glos died on 6 January 2021 in Kraków, aged 84.Zmarł Wiesław Głos, pzszerm.pl ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish fencers Category:Sportspeople from Kraków
title: Wiesław Glos
